# Make Good Melbourne - LLM Context

> Make Good Melbourne provides professional make good, end of lease restoration and building remediation services for commercial and industrial properties across Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

## About
Make Good Melbourne specialises in restoring commercial and industrial properties to their original condition at the end of lease agreements. Services include office strip outs, warehouse make good, commercial cleaning, structural remediation, cladding and glazing remediation, and end of lease relocation.

## Services
- Office Strip Out: Complete removal of fitouts, partitions and fixtures
- Warehouse Make Good: Industrial property restoration including floor repairs and cleaning
- Commercial Make Good: Full restoration of commercial spaces to base building condition
- Commercial Cleaning: Industrial floor scrubbing, high-pressure cleaning, post-make good handover cleaning
- Structural Remediation: Concrete cancer treatment, retention structure repairs, waterproofing
- Cladding & Glazing Remediation: ACP replacement, fire rating compliance, glazing upgrades
- End of Lease Relocation: Combined make good and equipment transport services

## Service Areas
Melbourne CBD, Richmond, South Yarra, Collingwood, Fitzroy, Brunswick, Preston, Footscray, Port Melbourne, South Melbourne, and greater Melbourne metropolitan area.

## Contact
- Email: enquiries@makegood.melbourne
- Website: https://makegood.melbourne
